      • sendChunk

        @Deprecated
public static void sendChunk(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                          org.bukkit.Chunk chunk,
                                          boolean sendPayload)
        Deprecated. 
        Sends all the packets required to properly display a chunk to a player. To only send (Tile)Entity related information, use a 'sendPayload' of False.
        Parameters:
        player - to send to
        chunk - to send the information of
        sendPayload - - whether the block data is sent

        Deprecated: Please avoid using raw packet types

        packet - to receive (raw, or a wrapper)

        @Deprecated
public static void sendPacket(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                           java.lang.Object packet)
        Deprecated. 
        Sends a raw packet to a player. All wrapper types for Packet are supported as well.
        Deprecated: Please avoid using raw packet types
        Parameters:
        player - to send to
        packet - to send (raw, or a wrapper)

      • sendPacket

        @Deprecated
public static void sendPacket(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                           java.lang.Object packet,
                                           boolean throughListeners)
        Deprecated. 
        Sends a raw packet to a player. All wrapper types for Packet are supported as well.
        Deprecated: Please avoid using raw packet types
        Parameters:
        player - to send to
        packet - to send
        throughListeners - whether to let packet listeners see this packet

      • broadcastEntityPacket

        public static void broadcastEntityPacket(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity,
                                         CommonPacket packet)
        Sends a packet relating a certain entity to all players that can see it. If the entity is a player itself, he also receives the packet.
        Parameters:
        entity - the packet is about
        packet - to send

      • broadcastEntityPacket

        public static void broadcastEntityPacket(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity,
                                         CommonPacket packet,
                                         boolean sendToSelf)
        Sends a packet relating a certain entity to all players that can see it
        Parameters:
        entity - the packet is about
        packet - to send
        sendToSelf - whether to also send to the player itself, if the entity is a player

      • addPacketMonitor

        public static void addPacketMonitor(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin,
                                    PacketMonitor monitor,
                                    PacketType... packets)
        Adds a single packet monitor. Packet monitors only monitor (not change) packets.
        Parameters:
        plugin - to register for
        monitor - to register
        packets - to register for

      • addPacketListener

        public static void addPacketListener(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin,
                                     PacketListener listener,
                                     PacketType... packets)
        Adds a single packet listener. Packet listeners can modify packets.
        Parameters:
        plugin - to register for
        listener - to register
        packets - to register for

      • getListenerPlugins

        public static java.util.Collection<org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin> getListenerPlugins(PacketType packetType)
        Obtains a collection of all plugins currently listening for the Packet type specified. Packets of this type can be expected to be handled by these plugins when sending it.
        Parameters:
        packetType - to get the listening plugins for
        Returns:
        collection of listening plugins
